title: The Alterspire
opening: Marth did as Gotoh instructed and chose soldiers for his journey into the unseen. What lay within the tower in this alternate world to test him? Marth’s heart wavered. But with neither the divine blade Falchion nor the divine dragon girl to aid him, the tower’s master was his last hope of defeating Medeus. Gotoh had told Marth to find a coffin. So while most of his companions remained in the material world to battle Doluna, Marth and his chosen few scoured the tower to search of a mysterious savior.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: This must be the tower Lord Gotoh spoke of...

intro.speaker: Malledus
intro.line: Sire, it’s teeming with soldiers... Who are they? They fly no recognizable banner.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: They are the Keepers whose test I must pass.

intro.speaker: Malledus
intro.line: You mean to fight them, then?

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Gotoh says we must prove ourselves. Very well; we’ll seize the tower. Follow me!

end.speaker: Malledus
end.line: Sire, look! Stairs beneath the throne! Where could they lead?

end.speaker: Malledus
end.line: ...Do you think this is the coffin?

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: There are no others. And look: these markings around it are the same pattern we saw in the Fane of Raman...

end.speaker: Malledus
end.line: Hmm, you’re right...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: We found a dragon girl in the fane... I wonder if these symbols-Huh?!

end.speaker: Malledus
end.line: Sire! The coffin... It’s opening!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: What? No! It must be some kind of trap, or... or some kind of... er...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: ...woman? Could she be the master Gotoh spoke of?

end.speaker: Nagi
end.line: ...Who are you?

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: My name is Marth, prince of Altea. And you, my lady?

end.speaker: Nagi
end.line: Me?! My name... is Nagi.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Nagi... I was sent here to find you, by a man named Gotoh.

end.speaker: Nagi
end.line: Gotoh... I know that name...But from where? I cannot recall.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: You’ve lost your memory?

end.speaker: Nagi
end.line: I... cannot say for certain. But your voice... I heard you calling. Did you rouse me from my sleep?

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: I... er... Not on purpose?

end.speaker: Nagi
end.line: Your soul... called out to me...begging for my help. For this blade...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: That...that’s Falchion! How did you get it?!

end.speaker: Nagi
end.line: I cannot remember... But you need it, I know that. And you need my powers.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Your... powers, my lady?

end.speaker: Nagi
end.line: Take me with you. I must... finish what I started... I think. I must fight with you.
